attributes.action: stop claiming the purchase of UK companies by foreign companies is foreign investment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foreign owned companies are buying up UK companies at a record rate. However, this is being called "foreign investment" by the UK government. It is not foreign investment, it is foreign ownership of UK PLC; who can than take the name and close down the UK side of the business.
